mapper.select: SELECT id, ip, operate_user as operateUser, operate_modile as operateModule, log_content as logContent, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM sys_log
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log (id, ip, operate_user, operate_module, log_content, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{ip}, #{operateUser}, #{operateModule}, #{logContent}, #{createTime});
